In the letter from his parents was enclosed a letter of recommendation to Bagrati6n which the old countess at Anna Mikhdylovna's advice had obtained through an acquaintance and sent to her son, asking him to take it to its des- tination and make use of it. 
"What nonsense! Much I need it!" said Ros- t6v, throwing the letter under the table.
